remark.en: Restricted to students who have taken ‘Introduction to Teaching Chinese as a Second or Foreign Language‘
remark.ch: 華語教學學分學程必修課程。限修畢:語言學概論、華語文教學概論、華語文教材教法、國語語音學、漢語語法學課程。未符合上列修畢條件之學生，老師有權退選本課程。

goal.en: After this semester, students should have the basic abilities of: 1. teaching in a CSL class; 2. working on need and assessment; 3. developing CSL materials
goal.ch: 學生修習完畢本課程應能具備: 1. 課堂教學實踐之能力; 2. 教學分析與評量之基本能力; 3. 教材評估與編撰之基本能力.

textbook.en: Materials selected and edited by the instructor

method.en: Lecture Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: Class participation 70% Class Performance (30%) Practice in a classroom (40%) Final presentation 30% # Performance means students' motivation, discussion, presentation, interaction, and cooperation with other students in class.
grading.ch: 課程參與 70% 課堂表現(30%) 課堂實習 (40%) 期末演示 30% # 課堂表現: 指聽講態度、發言、與其他同學互動及合作之表現。

flex_desc.en: There will be 2 weeks of individual training this semester.
flex_desc.ch: 本學期有2週將針對學生教學弱點進行個別強化。
